incidents.name: 500 Errors on Flex Custom Plugins

incident_updates.body: Twilio Functions & Assets was degraded for 30 minutes between 05:00 and 05:30 Pacific Time on 26/04/2023. During this period of time, a subset of customers may have experienced 5xx while fetching assets for plugins. Flex Insights was not impacted and was usable for customers during this time. The issue has now been resolved.

affected_components.name: FLEX - Flex Insights

incident_updates.body: Our monitoring systems have detected a potential issue with Twilio Functions & Assets. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have more information.

affected_components.name: FLEX - Flex Insights

incidents.name: Some International Calls Might Have Failed Due to a Parsing Error

incident_updates.body: Due to a software update, some international To numbers were incorrectly parsed for 20 hours and 47 minutes between 17:14 on 04/20/2023 and 12:01 on 04/21/2023 Pacific Time. During this period of time, customers may have experienced calls failures.
Our engineers are currently investigating the customer impact of a retroactive issue with voice calls got blocked. We will follow up and provide customer impact details within 2 hours.
